RoutingInfo.AdditionalInformation: 843200 is prefix of Viettel hub for roaming inbound in Viettel INE Format: 843200[CC][NDC]xxx (length 15 digits) 8432005193xxx --> Bitel, Peru (PERVT) 84320050933xxx --> Natcom, Haiti (HTIHT) 843200856209xxx --> Unitel, Lao (LAOLA) 84320085597xxx --> Metfone, Cambodia (KHMVT) 84320025886xxx --> Movitel, Mozambique (MOZVT) 84320067075xxx --> Telemor, Timor-Leste (TLSVT) 84320023766xxx --> Nexttel, Cameroon (CMRVT) 84320025769xxx --> Lumitel, Burundi (BDIVT) 84320025562xxx --> Halotel, Tanzania (TZAVT)
